Text:
Why this torrent is to slooowww.
More than 15 hours and only 10%. Upload faster than down 15 times and down is bellow 7 kB/s.

This file is ONLY the extra's not the whole movie...  I appreciate the upload but it would have been SUPER if you could have clarified that in the comments!! Any chance of the whole movie for less than 5GiB?

There is a big EXTRAS in the file name. I didn't needed any specification to realize that this is just for the extras portion of the bluray, since there is another release with a similar name for the movie itself. Wish that this include subs though.
